name: The Chiarito Tabernacle
description: The Chiarito Tabernacle; Pacino di Bonaguida (Italian (Florentine), active about 1303 - about 1347); Florence, Tuscany, Italy; 1340s; Gilded gesso and tempera on panel; Framed [outer dim]: 101.3 × 113.5 cm (39 7/8 × 44 11/16 in.); 85.PB.311; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: The Chiarito Tabernacle
medium: Gilded gesso and tempera on panel
